name: mybibliotecha
tagline: A self-hosted book collection manager with tagging, metadata editing, and search
description: MyBibliotheca is a self-hosted book collection manager. It provides tagging, metadata editing, and search features to organize large book libraries with a simple web UI.

features.title: Book Cataloging
features.description: Organize personal book collections with detailed metadata, covers, and custom categorization systems

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find books quickly using title, author, genre, tags, or custom metadata with powerful filtering options

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Modify book information, add custom tags, and update details through an intuitive web interface

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and manage book cover images with automatic resizing and optimization features

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create custom tags and categories to organize books by genre, reading status, or personal preferences

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Bulk import book data from CSV files, ISBN lookups, or other library management systems

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your library from any device through a clean, responsive web-based interface
